snippet: A Los Angeles-based philanthropist has suspended the Broad Prize, which his foundation gives annually to an urban school district, saying he cannot find districts worthy of the award.
abstract: Billionaire philanthropist Eli Broad suspends $1 million Broad Prize, saying he cannot find urban school districts that are deserving of award, which has been bestowed upon 12 school districts since 2002.
lead_paragraph: A Los Angeles-based philanthropist has suspended the Broad Prize, which his foundation gives annually to an urban school district, saying he cannot find districts worthy of the award.

headline.main: Billionaire Suspends Prize Given to Schools
headline.print_headline: Billionaire Suspends Prize Given to Schools
